data.name: Edna & Harvey: Harvey's New Eyes Developer Commentary
data.detailed_description:
The developer commentary for "Harvey's New Eyes", narrated by the game's creator – Poki!

In this developer commentary, Poki takes you behind the scenes of "Harvey's New Eyes", shares stories about the development, as well as some crazy anecdotes. Of course, he also takes the opportunity to grab his guitar every now and then!

Features

  • Developer commentary covering the game from start to finish
  • Narrated in German
  • Subtitles in German and English
  • Poki playing the guitar and singing!

data.short_description: The developer commentary for "Harvey's New Eyes", narrated by the game's creator – Poki!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, Russian, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows Vista/7
  • Processor:2GHz (Single Core) or 1,8GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory:1536 MB RAM
  • Graphics:ATI Radeon HD 3400 Series, Geforce 9400 Series with at least 256 MB VRAM
  • Hard Drive:1100 MB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows Vista/7/8
  • Processor:2.6 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:ATI Radeon HD 4500 Series, Geforce 9400 GT or higher
  • Hard Drive:1100 MB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:MacOS X Lion (10.7)
  • Processor:2 GHz (Dual Core) Intel
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Hard Drive:1100 MB HD space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Ubuntu 12.04 (64 Bit only)
  • Processor:2GHz (Single Core) or 1,8GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory:1536 MB RAM
  • Graphics:Geforce 9400 Series, ATI Radeon HD 4500 Series with at least 256 MB VRAM and proprietary drivers, latest OpenGL driver
  • Hard Drive:1100 MB HD space
  • Sound:Sound Card with latest drivers
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Ubuntu 14.04 (64 Bit only)
  • Processor:2.6 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:ATI Radeon HD 5600 Series, Geforce 9400 GT or better with proprietary drivers
  • Hard Drive:1100 MB HD space
  • Sound:Sound Card with latest drivers
